channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Iran Starts New Talks Today Over Its Nuclear Program. Here’s What to Know.
item.description: Three European powers will meet with an Iranian minister to try to reopen negotiations over the limits of its nuclear activities.

item.title: Photo Shows Murderer Returning to U.S. in Trump Prisoner Swap With Venezuela
item.description: President Trump has vowed to expel criminals, but a photo of a convicted killer being brought to the U.S. in a prisoner swap sends another message.

item.title: For One Man, It Didn’t Take Much to Make an Embassy in India
item.description: For almost eight years, an Indian man hid a range of criminal activities behind fake diplomatic missions before finally being caught this week.

item.title: France Will Recognize Palestinian Statehood, Macron Says
item.description: The announcement sets France apart from the United States and most of its close allies, and could cause friction with President Trump.

item.title: Supreme Court blocks rule that blocks Voting Rights Act for now
item.description: The order guarantees voters, at least for now, the ability to sue to enforce rights guaranteed under the landmark 1965 law.
